description.p: You have entered a physiological or magical debt that enhances your survivability at the cost of your recovery.

Bargain: For 8 hours after you finish a long rest, you gain a +2 bonus to your Armor Class. However, you cannot benefit from another long rest until at least 20 hours have passed since the end of your last one.

sheet.description: +2 AC for 8 hours after a long rest. You cannot long rest again until 20 hours after your last one.
